title: IGNOU Placement Drive 2026: Campus Job Fair in Karnataka, Maharashtra & Uttarakhand
author: IGNOU Assignments Hub

title: IGNOU 39th Convocation 2026: Registration, Eligibility & Fee Details
description: IGNOU 39th Convocation 2026 is likely to be held in February. Check eligibility, online registration process, convocation fee, regional centre rules and degree by post details.

title: IGNOU B.Ed Admission January 2026
description: IGNOU has announced admission to the Bachelor of Education (B.Ed.) programme for the January 2026 session through an all-India entrance test. Check eligibility, admission process and important dates.

title: IGNOU Launches B.Sc Fabric and Apparel Design Programme Under FYUGP 2026
description: IGNOU has launched a new B.Sc Fabric and Apparel Design programme under the Four-Year Undergraduate Programme (FYUGP) starting from the January 2026 admission cycle.

title: IGNOU Campus Placement Drive 2026 (Job Fair)
description: IGNOU Career Placement Cell will organise a campus placement drive and job fair in 2026 for eligible students.

title: IGNOU Launches New Skill-Based Courses for 2026 Admissions
description: IGNOU has announced several new job-oriented and skill-based courses for students enrolling in the 2026 academic cycle.

title: IGNOU Extends Re-Registration Deadline for January 2026 Session
description: IGNOU has officially extended the re-registration deadline for all ODL and Online programmes for the January 2026 session until 31 January 2026.

title: IGNOU Puts Psychology Programmes on Hold for January 2026 Admission
description: IGNOU has put MA Psychology, BA Psychology and PG Diploma in Mental Health programmes on hold for the January 2026 admission cycle.

title: President Droupadi Murmu Inaugurates IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha
description: The President of India inaugurated a new IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha to strengthen skill-based education.
